text: Yankee Doodle in Berlin is a 1919 American silent World War I comedy movie. It was directed by F. Richard Jones. The movie stars Bothwell Browne, Ford Sterling, Bert Roach, Malcolm St. Clair, Marie Prevost, Chester Conklin, Heinie Conklin, Eva Thatcher. ==Other websites== * Category:1919 comedy movies Category:1910s war movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American war movies Category:World War I movies Category:Movies directed by F. Richard Jones
title: Yankee Doodle in Berlin
